AI_Types.description: Large Language Models (LLMs) are designed for natural language understanding and generation, supporting functionalities such as text generation, conversation, reasoning, and fine-tuning. They often offer token-based pricing and support both online and batch inference.

Multimodal models process and generate multiple types of data including text, images, video, and audio, enabling functionalities such as visual understanding, image/video generation, and integration with external tools.
Text-to-Image models generate images from textual descriptions or prompts and are used for creative design and image synthesis.
Speech-to-Text models convert spoken language into text.
Text-to-Speech models convert text into natural-sounding speech, often featuring capabilities such as speech synthesis and voice cloning.
Embedding models convert text or images into vector representations for semantic analysis, search, and clustering.
Code Generation models specialize in generating code from natural language prompts.
AI Agents are interactive systems that assist with tasks, data analysis, and tool integration.
AI Search tools provide functionalities for internet search and data retrieval, including file search and re-ranking.
